name: ResendCampaignToSegments
description:
Resend a campaign to specific segments.

Use this tool to replicate and resend a Mailchimp campaign to segments like non-openers or new subscribers.

parameters.name: campaign_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for identifying the campaign to replicate and resend.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: resend_shortcut_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of segment to resend the campaign to. Options: 'to_non_openers', 'to_new_subscribers', 'to_non_clickers', 'to_non_purchasers'. Default is 'to_non_openers'.

value_schema.description: Which campaign resend shortcut to use. Default is `to_non_openers`.
